sense.def: Pathological Condition of zheng 癥 , concretion-illness, that forms when someone inadvertently consumes living bugs/worms or snakes that gather in the abdomen Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 11: 治蛇癥方。白馬尾切長五分，以酒服方寸匕，大者自出 , “Recipe to cure snake concretion-illness : ingest with wine one square-inch spoon of white horse tail cut in the length of five fen . Large ones will leave by themselves”.
